SELECT t1.* ,t2.theme_name1 ,t3.work_contents_class_name ,t4.work_contents_code_name FROM t_manhour AS t1 JOIN m_theme AS t2 ON t1.theme_no = t2.theme_no JOIN m_work_contents_class t3 ON t1.work_contents_class = t3.work_contents_class JOIN m_work_contents t4 ON t1.work_contents_class = t4.work_contents_class and t1.work_contents_code = t4.work_contents_code WHERE 1 = 1
AND t1.YEAR = :Year
AND t1.Month = :Month
AND t1.user_no = :User_no
ORDER BY t1.theme_no

SELECT t1.year ,t1.month ,t1.user_no ,t1.theme_no ,t1.work_contents_code ,t1.work_contents_class ,t1.work_contents_detail FROM t_manhour AS t1 WHERE 1=1 AND t1.year = :Year
AND t1.month = :Month
AND t1.user_no = :User_no
AND t1.theme_no = :Theme_no
AND t1.work_contents_class = :Work_contents_class
AND t1.work_contents_code = :Work_contents_code
AND t1.work_contents_detail = :Work_contents_detail

SELECT * FROM m_user_screen_item WHERE 1=1
AND user_no = :User_no
AND screen_url = :Screen_url

SELECT t1.user_no ,t1.year ,t1.month ,t1.group_code ,t1.site_code ,t1.theme_no ,t1.work_contents_class ,t1.work_contents_code ,t1.work_contents_detail FROM t_manhour t1 JOIN m_theme t2 ON t1.theme_no = t2.theme_no WHERE 1=1 AND t1.year = :Year AND t1.month = :Month AND t1.pin_flg = true AND t1.user_no = :User_no order by t2.theme_no

SELECT * FROM m_theme WHERE 1=1
AND theme_no = :ThemeNo
AND theme_name1 like :ThemeName OR theme_name2 like :ThemeName
AND sold_flg = :SoldFlg
AND accounting_group_code = :GroupCode
AND sales_object_code = :ObjectCode

UPDATE t_manhour SET day1 = :Day1, day2 =:Day2, day3 = :Day3,day4 =:Day4,day5 = :Day5,day6 =:Day6,day7 = :Day7,day8 =:Day8,day9 = :Day9,day10 =:Day10, day11 =:Day11, day12 =:Day12,day13 = :Day13,day14 =:Day14,day15 = :Day15,day16 =:Day16,day17 = :Day17,day18 =:Day18,day19 = :Day19,day20 =:Day20, day21 =:Day21,day22 =:Day22,day23 =:Day23,day24 =:Day24,day25 =:Day25,day26 =:Day26,day27 =:Day27,day28 =:Day28,day29 =:Day29,day30 =:Day30,day31 =:Day31, pin_flg =:Pin_flg,total =:Total, fix_date =:Fix_date
WHERE year = :Year AND month = :Month AND user_no = :User_no AND Theme_no = :Theme_no AND work_contents_class = :Work_contents_class AND work_contents_code = :Work_contents_code AND work_contents_detail = :Work_contents_detail

UPDATE t_manhour SET theme_no = :NewTheme_no, work_contents_class =:NewWork_contents_class,work_contents_code = :NewWork_contents_code ,work_contents_detail = :NewWork_contents_detail
WHERE year = :Year AND month = :Month AND user_no = :User_no AND theme_no = :Theme_no AND work_contents_class = :Work_contents_class AND work_contents_code = :Work_contents_code AND work_contents_detail = :Work_contents_detail

UPDATE t_manhour SET {0} = :Day, pin_flg =:Pin_flg, total =:Total, fix_date =:Fix_date
WHERE year = :Year AND month = :Month AND user_no = :User_no AND Theme_no = :Theme_no AND work_contents_class = :Work_contents_class AND work_contents_code = :Work_contents_code AND work_contents_detail = :Work_contents_detail

UPDATE t_manhour SET {0} = :Day1, {1} =:Day2, {2} = :Day3, {3} =:Day4, {4} = :Day5, {5} =:Day6, {6} = :Day7 ,pin_flg =:Pin_flg,total =:Total, fix_date =:Fix_date
WHERE year = :Year AND month = :Month AND user_no = :User_no AND Theme_no = :Theme_no AND work_contents_class = :Work_contents_class AND work_contents_code = :Work_contents_code AND work_contents_detail = :Work_contents_detail

DELETE FROM t_manhour WHERE year = :Year AND month = :Month AND user_no = :User_no AND Theme_no = :Theme_no AND work_contents_class = :Work_contents_class AND work_contents_code = :Work_contents_code AND work_contents_detail = :Work_contents_detail
UPDATE m_user_screen_item SET screen_input =:ScreenInput WHERE screen_url =:ScreenUrl AND user_no =:UserNo AND screen_item = :ScreenItem
SELECT DISTINCT accounting_group_code, accounting_group_name FROM m_group ORDER BY accounting_group_code
SELECT work_contents_class, work_contents_code, work_contents_code_name FROM m_work_contents ORDER BY work_contents_code
UPDATE m_user_screen_item SET screen_item = :ScreenItem WHERE screen_url =:ScreenUrl AND user_no =:UserNo
SELECT DATE_PART('day', date) FROM m_calendar WHERE DATE_PART('year', date) = :Year AND DATE_PART('month',date) = :Month AND horiday = true AND site_code =:SiteCode ORDER BY DATE_PART('day', date)

UPDATE t_manhour SET pin_flg = false WHERE year = :Year AND month = :Month AND user_no = :User_no AND Theme_no = :Theme_no AND work_contents_class = :Work_contents_class AND work_contents_code = :Work_contents_code AND work_contents_detail = :Work_contents_detail
